## ContainsLazy type

Check if array contains any lazy modules

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContainsLazy<T extends readonly Module[]> = Extract<T[number], {
    __lazy: true;
}> extends never ? false : true;
```
**References:** [Module](../module/)
